resources.string: Password must have at least 10 characters\n

Please enter a valid email / password combination

You must have a recent login before attempting this operation

Practice your technical interview skills through simulated interviews. Our chatbot conducts realistic mock interviews, offering a diverse set of technical questions and scenarios to help you refine your responses and build confidence.

Receive comprehensive feedback and analysis post-interview. The chatbot evaluates your performance, highlighting strengths and areas for improvement. Gain insights into your interview style, technical knowledge, and communication skills.

Tailored learning paths designed to address your specific areas of improvement. Based on your performance in mock interviews, the chatbot suggests personalized resources, articles, and practice problems to bolster your weak areas and enhance your strengths.
